title: Listen Live: 6PM Pigskin Preview
text:
Listen Live: 6PM Pigskin Preview EDGYTIM Talk about it in the edgytim Message Boards 
2015 WJOL AM 1340 Joliet Football Broadcast Schedule 
Listen Live! Just CLICK HERE to listen to all WJOL Football Broadcasts and all local programming streamed live via the internet. 
Pigskin Preview , a weekly talk show devoted to Prep Football in Will County as well as around the state of Illinois will return for it's 15th season on WJOL AM 1340 in Joliet every Thursday from 6-8PM CST. Pigskin Preview is hosted by EDGYTIM.com publisher Tim O'Halloran along with "The Coach" Joe Rodeghero. Also call the show 815-254-7300 and join in on the conversaation. 
This week's Guest List? 
Steve Soucie IHSA Playoff Projectionist Brian Cooney Oswego
